title: Roxanne Argudin Court Filings Criminal Cases (Town Clerk)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Virginia Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All court filings, docket entries, and case records for any criminal or civil cases where Roxanne Argudin appears as:
- Defendant
- Respondent
- Named party

From January 2024 to present. Include case numbers, charges, and dispositions.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Tom Nash, a citizen of Virginia, in coordination with Hamilton Jones.

title: EMS Response Records Roxanne Argudin Incident (Culpeper County Sheriff's Office)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Virginia Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All EMS run sheets, patient care reports, and transport records for responses to Camp Road on August 16, 2025.

With HIPAA-required redactions only (SSN, DOB, insurance), please include:
- Nature of call

title: Police Body Camera Footage Roxanne Argudin Assault (Culpeper County Sheriff's Office)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Virginia Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All body-worn camera footage from all responding officers to the domestic violence incident on Camp Road on August 16, 2025. 

Please include footage from:
- Initial response
- Witness interviews
- Suspect interactions
- Evidence documentation
- Full incident from arrival to departure

Redact only faces of minors if required by law.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Tom Nash, a citizen of Virginia, in coordination with Hamilton Jones.

title: Roxanne Argudin 911 Call Recording Domestic Violence August 16 (Culpeper County Sheriff's Office)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Virginia Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All 911 emergency call recordings and Computer Aided Dispatch (CAD) notes for calls to Camp Road, Culpeper County on August 16, 2025, between 5:00 PM and 11:59 PM, specifically related to domestic disturbances, assault, or violence.

This includes:
- Audio recordings of all emergency calls
- CAD incident notes
- Call taker notes
- Dispatch logs
- Response priority classifications

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.
